entry.title: Bitcoin Core update notice
entry.summary: Bitcoin Core 0.16.3 has been released with a fix for CVE-2018-17144, and all network participants have been urged to upgrade as soon as possible. For those who build from source, the 0.14, 0.15, 0.16, 0.17, and master branches on GitHub are also fixed. The release notes can be found on the Bitcoin Core website.
